fields.name: query
fields.comment: The user query/message to send to the AI agent

fields.name: systemMessage
fields.comment: System message to define agent behavior

fields.name: tools
fields.comment: List of tool names available to the agent. Keep empty to use all tools

fields.name: provider
fields.comment: AI provider name. Keep empty to use default from variables.yaml

fields.name: model
fields.comment: AI model name. Keep empty to use default from variables.yaml

fields.name: resultType
fields.comment: Expected result type class for structured output. Keep null for String result
